::DrillBit::

"I'm sure KitKat will allow you in. Follow me, the base is close."
He started to walk away. After a few feet, he turned waiting for her.

::Hot Rod::

Her words were fusion blasts to him. Kill her? Never!
"You are right, the Matrix has made my programing Maximal. The
reprograming you did is gone. But one thing remained, my love for you!"
He put his arm around her, holding her close.
"Thats why I'm here, and not the Cybertronian Fire. My programing may be
Maximal, but I'll do anything to be with you. That includes staying with
the Alliance."
That was an exageration. He wasn't sure if he would really work for the
Alliance. He was torn between his Maximal/Autobot heritage, and his love
for her.

He looked at her wounds.
"You need a CR. The question is, the Alliance base, or the CF. If you
ask me you are more like a Maximal. You have a kind good natured spark.
You were serving the Alliance cause Zardus reprogramed you.(Thats what
happaned right?) That programing is gong now. You arn't a Alliance
temptress anymore. You and me are alike.
I want to stay with you, no matter what. Now you have to decide between
Alliance or Maximal. Just remember I'll stay no matter what you pick."

He put his hands on her cheeks, rubing away any tears.
"Omae o korosu," he said in Japanese.
He then kissed her, with all the love he felt for her.
